participant_1.name: Emily
participant_1.personality: Thoughtful and caring, with a strong focus on personal growth and interests.
participant_1.background: I focus on my career and hobbies, so social media isn't a priority for me. I still have a photo from my senior prom in my wallet. I'm not sure if I could be a fashion designer if I were blind, because I would have a hard time seeing the colors and textures of fabrics. My favorite food is Italian. My mother has 500 pairs of shoes.

participant_2.name: Jake
participant_2.personality: Adventurous and playful, enjoys spending time outdoors and cherishes family moments.
participant_2.background: I enjoy riding horses, but I need to be more mindful of my surroundings when I do so. I love taking my pug Corky to the dog park. I love all sorts of fresh vegetables. I hate to lose. I have one little boy named Owen.

content.text: Hi!
Hello!
How are you?
Doing well, thanks for asking! How about you?
I'm doing well too! What are your hobbies?
I love riding horses, and I also love taking my pug Corky to the dog park.
That's awesome! I love dogs, but I don't have one of my own.
Oh no! You should get one! They're the best!
I know, I've been wanting one for a while, but I just haven't had the time to take care of one.
Well, when you do get one, make sure you get a pug! They're the best dogs in the world.
Thanks for the advice! I'll definitely keep that in mind.
No problem! So, what are your hobbies?
I love to cook, and I also love to read.
Oh, that's cool! I love to cook too, but I don't read as much as I used to.
What's your favorite thing to cook?
I love to make pasta dishes, especially lasagna.
Oh, lasagna is my favorite! I love making it too.
That's so cool! We should have a lasagna cook-off sometime!
That would be fun! I'd love to have a lasagna cook-off.
Great! We can set it up for sometime next week.
Sounds good! I'll start working on my lasagna recipe.
Me too! I can't wait
